评论详情: I’m 6’0” and 200lbs. I ordered the large and while the pants fit, the jacket is pretty small. Specifically the arms are short.  I think an XL set would be too large based on how it fits me. If I could order the jacket and pants sparatetly, then I’d go large pants and xl jacket. Fabric a bit itchy too.
my 23rd old son was the DJ at my daughters 8th grade glow party dance at school and he was a huge hit with this fun track suit, he said it was comfortable and fit great and the price was right!
The size and fit is good, but the picture on the site is a red/orange for the main part but it’s actually way pinker in reality. The pink spots blend right in instead of sticking out
The price is great, it's comfortable but the fabric is very thin so it doesn't give any weather protection but that makes it better for summer. The color pops and the sizing was fine.
Good quality, ordered an XL, pants fit very well, jacket was a little tight.

I ordered this for a work event I was the DJ for. It was perfect! Wonderful quality, not see through, and fabric has a little stretch.

Clothing held up for the fundraiser it was needed for but I had to send the first order back because when my husband opened the package to try it on, he found dirty napkins in the pocket. We sent it back and ordered a new one, especially since the napkins were clearly used, and the new one had raffle tickets in the pocket of the jacket. I did not note anywhere it saying these were used prior to buying.
Sized up for this to fit over snow pants for a ski weekend. So fun.

This was for an 80s party at work. It was cheap-poorly made, one pocket was partially sewn closed. That said, for the price point it did what it was supposed to do. It’s a costume quality fabric, don’t expect something for multiple uses.

Everything about this product is great. Look and feel were great. Sizing was right on.

this was for Halloween 80's aerobic theme and it DELIVERED! Love the fabric- texture is amazing and it's heavy enough so you're not freezing but not sweltering if it's a little sunny. The pattern is my favorite thing and it was everything I'd hoped for! Came right on time too!
Excellent quality couldn't ask for better
My husband wore this for our 80s/90s themed turkey olympics and it was a hit. Fits very comfortable and is great quality! Definitely recommend.
Being a 2XL I was worried that it would be to small in areas. I was thoroughly surprised that it fit perfectly. Package comes vacuum sealed and the material feels amazing.

This is a cute track suit. It looks just like the listing. It's machine washable but not dryer safe. The material is sewn decently, but it's pretty cheap feeling. It's not thin, it just doesn't feel super great on the skin. The best way I can describe this is, think of the best Halloween costume you ever bought. Where you didn't spend a ton but it was better quality than you expected. So for a Halloween costume this is great, for everyday wear I'm not totally sold.
Great outfit! Comfy and true to size. Graphics are super cool
